title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 347.14 - Reimbursement to local districts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 347.14 - Reimbursement to local districts

State Regulations

Each local social services district will maintain an
accounting system and supporting fiscal records in accordance with Part 595 of
this Title to assure that claims for reimbursement are in accordance with
applicable State requirements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
347.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
